confirmed_facts: LGμ΄λ…Έν… plans to showcase 35 products at CES 2026 in Las Vegas.
The company will display two mockβ€‘up vehicles: an autonomous vehicle and an electric vehicle.
The autonomous vehicle mockβ€‘up will feature 20 components including sensors, communication, lighting, and an underβ€‘display camera module.
The electric vehicle mockβ€‘up will include 15 core power and motor products such as a wireless BMS and Bβ€‘Link.
LGμ΄λ…Έν… will use its AIβ€‘based AX software for active cleaning camera modules.
The autonomous vehicle mockβ€‘up will allow driver and passenger seats to be used for simulation.
The mockβ€‘ups will be displayed at the LVCC West Hall entrance booth.

timeline.event: LGμ΄λ…Έν… announced its CES 2026 showcase plans.
CES 2026 opening in Las Vegas; LGμ΄λ…Έν… will exhibit its mockβ€‘ups.
